member.name: M:InsightClientLibrary.InsightClient.VerifyValidRoute(InsightClientLibrary.ServiceGraph)
member.summary: Goes over all the elements in the graph, for each element check the incoming elements in Insight database and in the built graph route. If every grapgh element has the same incoming elements in both the graph route and Insight database, we can deduct that the graph is valid
member.param: the graph to check for a valid route
member.returns: true if the graph route is valid, false otherwise

member.returns: Grapgh which represents the service element route
